content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Motivation is one of the most valuable areas of contributions: help Managers increase and maintain each of their team's member motivation through both monetary and non-financial ways. People Management strongly influences (increases) people engagement, quality of their performance, decreases retention rate, and supports Employee Retention process as well.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Because People Advisory/Operations/Programs Specialists work with people on an organizational (behavioral) and not on psychological (deeply personal or clinical) level, they can help in the following four
